/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. 

Trees line the street, providing a touch of greenery amidst the concrete structures. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
